boardgame.description: Featuring four new factions and eight new bases, Smash Up: Awesome Level 9000 _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; a.k.a. Smash Up II _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; integrates into the Smash Up base game, bringing exponential new combinations of factions and playstyles! Smash Up: Awesome Level 9000 includes:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Killer Plants _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; Better deal with these guys fast because if you leave them alone, they'll grow all over the place...like weeds! *rimshot*_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Ghosts _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; Unlike in just about every card game in history, Ghosts benefit from having fewer cards in your hand. Can you be immaterial?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Steampunks _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; Can't leave a good base alone? The Steampunks will add new abilities to bases to help your strategies._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Bear Cavalry _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; What's scary? A bear. What's really scary? A cossack riding a bear! Bear Cavalry will use fear to drive opposing minions to other bases._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgameintegration: Smash Up: Oops, You Did It Again

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups

listing.notes: Alderac Entertainment Group (AEG5502) Awesome level... rising... Thought you had enough awesome with Pirates, Ninja, and Zombies? Well get a load of this, bucko-Killer Plants, Steampunks, Ghosts, and Bear Cavalry are here to smash into your game! Plants grow out of control, Steampunks build on bases, Ghosts shriek out of the ether, and Bear Cavalry scare away the opposition. Two players can play with just these decks, or mix them with original-recipe Smash Up for up to 4 players, and feel your awesome level skyrocket! Feels good, doesn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t it?
